hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #5# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LH (Lab).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Key-locked in Fire Temple? Maybe Volvagia has your Small Key.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
